Public Class ResXResourceReader Implements IDisposable, IEnumerable, IResourceReader
public ref class ResXResourceReader : IDisposable, System::Collections::IEnumerable, System::Resources::IResourceReader
type ResXResourceReader = class interface IResourceReader interface IEnumerable interface IDisposable

summary.span: 枚举 XML 资源 (.resx) 文件和流，并读取顺序资源名称和值对。

span.span: Enumerates XML resource (.resx) files and streams, and reads the sequential resource name and value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的默认实现接口，它读取 XML 格式的资源信息。The class provides a default implementation of the interface that reads resource information in an XML format. 若要从二进制资源的格式中读取资源信息，请使用类。To read resource information from a binary resource format, use the class. 你使用类来遍历字典枚举器枚举.resx 文件中的资源 () 返回的方法。You use the class to enumerate resources in .resx files by traversing the dictionary enumerator () that is returned by the method. 调用提供的方法前进到下一步的资源并读取的名称和值的.resx 文件中的每个资源。You call the methods provided by to advance to the next resource and to read the name and value of each resource in the .resx file. > [!NOTE] > 类提供了两个枚举器。The class provides two enumerators. 方法返回对象; 我们建议使用此方法来枚举资源。The method returns an object; we recommend that you use this method to enumerate resources. 方法是显式接口实现返回对象; 我们不建议使用。The method is an explicit interface implementation that returns an object; we do not recommend its use. 下面的示例使用方法来获取用于枚举.resx 文件中的资源的对象。The following example uses the method to obtain an object that is used to enumerate the resources in a .resx file. 该示例包含`CreateResourceFile`例程可创建必需的资源文件。The example includes a `CreateResourceFile` routine that creates the necessary resource file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/cs/resxresourcereader1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/vb/resxresourcereader1.vb#1)] 如果属性是`true`的值属性是对象而不是资源值。If the property is `true`, the value of the property is a object rather than the resource value. 这将使资源项的注释可从属性。This makes a resource item's comment available from the property. 下面的示例设置属性`true`并枚举.resx 文件中的资源The following example sets the property to `true` and enumerates the resources in a .resx file, [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/cs/resxresourcereader2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/vb/resxresourcereader2.vb#2)] 如果是`true`、枚举中的项可以是：If is `true`, the items in the enumeration can be either: - 名为及其数据的资源。Named resources along with their data. 在这种情况下，属性是`null`。In this case, the property is `null`. - 名为资源以及包含资源数据的文件的名称。Named resources along with the name of the file that contains the resource data. 在这种情况下，属性返回提供的资源，包括其文件名的相关信息的对象。In this case, the property returns a object that provides information about the resource, including its filename. 如果使用相对文件名称，还应始终设置属性来提供的相对文件路径的参考点。If relative file names are used, you should always set the property to provide a reference point for the relative file path. 如果你想要从.resx 文件中检索命名的资源，而不是枚举其资源，可以实例化对象并调用其`GetString`和`GetObject`方法。If you want to retrieve named resources from a .resx file rather than enumerating its resources, you can instantiate a object and call its `GetString` and `GetObject` methods. > [!NOTE] > 类包含链接要求，并且在类级别应用于所有成员继承要求。The class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时将引发异常。A exception is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用来循环访问.resx 文件中的资源。The following example demonstrates how to use a to iterate through the resources in a .resx file. 首先， `rsxr`为文件创建`items.resx`。First, the `rsxr` is created for the file `items.resx`. 接下来，方法用于创建循环的资源并向控制台显示内容。Next, the method is used to create an to iterate through the resources and display the contents to the console. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/resxresourcereader.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/resxresourcereader.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/resxresourcereader.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ BasePath { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.BasePath : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置在 对象中指定的相对文件路径的基路径。

span.span: Gets or sets the base path for the relative file path specified in a object.

value.span: 如果路径预置在 对象中指定的相对文件路径中，则该路径产生到资源文件的绝对路径。

span.span: A path that, if prepended to the relative file path specified in a object, yields an absolute path to a resource file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于解析相对文件路径引用分配给属性对象。The property is used to resolve relative file path references that are assigned to the property of objects. 默认情况下，其值是，并且将与返回当前目录相关解析相对文件路径引用属性。By default, its value is , and relative file path references are resolved in relationship to the current directory returned by the property. 在开始枚举资源之前，应设置此属性。You should set this property before you begin enumerating resources. ## Examples 下面的示例创建包含映像的取值，并创建指定的应用程序创建了该资源的字符串资源的 XML 资源文件。The following example creates an XML resource file that contains images of dog breeds, and also creates a string resource that specifies the application that created the resource. 对象用于存储映像，而不是将二进制图像本身存储在资源文件的路径。 objects are used to store the path to the images rather than storing the binary images themselves in the resource file. 该示例设置属性，以便在映像的文件名称中的相对文件路径被解释为一个名为 C:\data 目录的子目录\\。The example sets the property so that the relative file paths in the images' file names are interpreted as subdirectories of a directory named C:\data\\. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.BasePath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.basepath/cs/basepathex1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.BasePath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.basepath/vb/basepathex1.vb#1)] 请注意，您必须添加对 System.Drawing.dll 成功编译项目的引用。Note that you must add a reference to System.Drawing.dll to compile the project successfully. 该示例还需要在一个名为 C:\data\images 目录中存在必要的映像\\。The example also requires that the necessary images exist in a directory named C:\data\images\\.

exception.span: 在设置操作中无法指定值，因为 XML 资源文件已被访问且正在使用。

span.span: In a set operation, a value cannot be specified because the XML resource file has already been accessed and is in use.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Close() cil managed
abstract member Close : unit -> unit override this.Close : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用允许使用的资源可以重新分配用于其他目的。Calling enables the resources used by the to be reallocated for other purposes. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。For more information about , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md). ## Examples 下面的示例将显示在控制台中，文件的资源，然后使用方法来关闭读取器和其他进程提供其资源。The following example displays the resources of a file to the console, and then uses the method to shut down the reader and to make its resources available for other processes. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/resxresourcereader.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/resxresourcereader.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/resxresourcereader.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过以下任一方法调用此方法方法或方法。This method can be called by either the method or the method. 调用此方法与`disposing`参数设置为`true`。 invokes this method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用此方法与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes this method with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 `true` 时，此方法释放该 引用的、由任何托管对象持有的全部资源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

span.para: 可以多次调用由其他对象。重写 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 时已释放的对象。有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅 [实现释放 Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。有关详细信息和，请参阅和。

can be called multiple times by other objects. When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to . For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). For more information about and , see and .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed
abstract member GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator override this.GetEnumerator : unit -> System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator

summary.span: 返回当前 对象的一个枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for the current object.

returns.span: 当前 对象的一个枚举数。

span.span: An enumerator for the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索 XML 资源 (.resx) 流或关联与当前字符串中的名称/值对对象。The method retrieves the name/value pairs in the XML resource (.resx) stream or string associated with the current object. 但是，如果属性设置为`true`之前调用，资源项检索作为对象。However, if the property is set to `true` before you call , the resource items are retrieved as objects. 在这种情况下，无论何种类型返回所有资源节点。In this case, all resource nodes are returned regardless of type. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来获取用于枚举.resx 文件中的资源的对象。The following example uses the method to obtain an object that is used to enumerate the resources in a .resx file. 该示例包含`CreateResourceFile`例程可创建必需的资源文件。The example includes a `CreateResourceFile` routine that creates the necessary resource file. [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/cs/resxresourcereader1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.resources.resxresourcereader.class/vb/resxresourcereader1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IDictionaryEnumerator GetMetadataEnumerator() cil managed

summary.span: 提供一个字典枚举数，该枚举数可以从当前 XML 资源文件或流中检索设计时属性。

span.span: Provides a dictionary enumerator that can retrieve the design-time properties from the current XML resource file or stream.

returns.span: 资源的元数据的枚举数。

span.span: An enumerator for the metadata in a resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为资源文件或流的名称/值对存储资源。Resources are stored as name/value pairs in a resource file or stream. 设计时属性，将调用元数据，它存储在资源文件或流以及运行时数据资源。Design-time properties, which are called metadata, are stored in the resource file or stream along with runtime data resources. 方法提供可以从资源文件或与当前的流检索元数据的对象对象。The method provides an object that can retrieve the metadata from the resource file or stream associated with the current object. 但是，如果属性设置为`true`之前调用，检索没有任何资源节点。However, if the property is set to `true` before you call , no resource nodes are retrieved. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来循环访问的 XML 资源文件中的元数据资源。The following example uses the method to iterate through the metadata resources in an XML resource file. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供属性。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/useresxdatanodes.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/useresxdatanodes.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResxresourceReader Example#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/useresxdatanodes.vb#4)]

summary.span: 返回当前 对象的一个枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator for the current object.

summary.span: 有关此成员的说明，请参见 方法。

span.span: For a description of this member, see the method.

returns.span: 一个枚举器，可以循环访问与当前 对象关联的 XML 资源 (.resx) 流或字符串中的名称/值对。

span.span: An enumerator that can iterate through the name/value pairs in the XML resource (.resx) stream or string associated with the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 若要枚举.resx 文件中的资源，我们建议调用方法，，然后调用`MoveNext`方法返回的对象。To enumerate the resources in a .resx file, we recommend that you call the method, and then call the `MoveNext` method on the returned object.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

summary.span: 有关此成员的说明，请参见 方法。

span.span: For a description of this member, see the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool UseResXDataNodes { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.UseResXDataNodes : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在读取当前 XML 资源文件或流时返回 对象。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether objects are returned when reading the current XML resource file or stream.

value.span: 如果检索资源数据节点，则为 ；如果忽略资源数据节点，则为 。

span.span: if resource data nodes are retrieved; if resource data nodes are ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以设置开始枚举资源之前的属性。You can set the property before you begin enumerating resources. 默认情况下，其值是`false`。By default, its value is `false`. ## Examples 下面的示例枚举并显示在 XML 文件的资源项。The following example enumerates and displays resource items in an XML file. 最初，设置为`false`以显示数据和元数据的项，因为它们存在于资源文件。Initially, is set to `false` to show both data and metadata items as they occur in the resource file. 第二个枚举均具有设置为`true`以便作为返回值是资源数据元素对象。The second enumeration has the set to `true` so that resource data elements are returned as objects. [!code-cpp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CPP/useresxdatanodes.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/CS/useresxdatanodes.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Resources.ResXResourceReader Example/VB/useresxdatanodes.vb#2)] 该示例使用的资源 XML 文件包含一个数据节点和一个元数据节点。The resource XML file used by the example contains one data node and one metadata node. 若要使用的 XML 文件与前面的示例，复制以下文本并将其保存到名为 Resource1.resx 的文件。To use the XML file with the previous example, copy the following text and save it to a file named Resource1.resx. ``` text/microsoft-resx 2.0 System.Resources.ResXResourceReader, System.Windows.Forms, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089 System.Resources.ResXResourceWriter, System.Windows.Forms, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089 Sample DATA value Sample METADATA value ```

exception.span: 在设置操作中，资源文件或流的枚举数已经打开。

span.span: In a set operation, the enumerator for the resource file or stream is already open.
